message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, tracing the ancestors of Nancy and Brandon reveals that both share Catherine as a common ancestor. Nancy's lineage can be traced through Christian, Juan, Lauren, Brittany, Kimberly, Daniel, Jason, Beverly, Anthony, Pamela, Frank, Benjamin, Joseph, Stephanie, Kathleen, Ryan, Paul, Noah, Sandra, Olivia, and finally to Catherine. Brandon's lineage can be traced through Randy, John, Diana, Rachel, Virginia, Joyce, Steven, Amanda, Rebecca, Ashley, Katherine, Charles, Jacob, Walter, Douglas, Matthew, Wayne, Ethan, Kathryn, Terry, Alice, David, Lori, Margaret, Natalie, Julie, William, Adam, James, Dylan, Joshua, Evelyn, Nicole, Arthur, Ruth, Samuel, Melissa, Gary, Kayla, Ralph, Nathan, Roy, Robert, Stephen, Kyle, Emma, Jacqueline, Grace, Edward, Lisa, Jeremy, Roger, Karen, Jose, Brian, Madison, Brenda, Danielle, Lawrence, Andrea, Willie, Alexander, Abigail, Joan, Michelle, Gloria, Diane, Carl, Donald, Thomas, Nicholas, Alexis, Megan, Sean, Vincent, Jerry, Emily, Jonathan, Bobby, Eugene, Marilyn, Doris, Henry, Justin, Marie, Charlotte, Amber, Heather, Carol, Isabella, Zachary, Russell, Aaron, Barbara, Judy, Ronald, Sara, Ann, Jeffrey, Peter, Sophia, Janice, Tyler, Jessica, Logan, and finally to Catherine. Therefore, Nancy and Brandon share a common ancestor.

<ANSWER>2</ANSWER>
